questions.title: 汤姆的妈妈觉得他的儿子是好学生，恰恰相反，我们班上的所有同学都觉得他是个坏学生。
questions.answer: Tom's mother thinks Tom is a good student, but on the contrary, all students in our class think that he is a bad student.

questions.title: 我喜欢甜食，相反我的老公喜欢辛辣的食品。
questions.answer: I like sweet food, but on the contrary, my husband likes acrid food.

questions.title: 我是一个安静的女孩，相反我的双胞胎妹妹是一个活泼的女孩。
questions.answer: I'm a quiet girl, but on the contrary, my twin sister is a vivacious girl.

questions.title: 我老板觉得我很闲，恰恰相反，我整天都很忙。
questions.answer: My boss thinks me idle, but on the contrary, I'm busy all day.

title: ——你觉得他每天都在认真学习，相反他每天都在玩电脑。
——那么他是个不诚实的男孩。

answer.en: You think he studies hard every day, but on the contrary, he plays computer every day.
Well, then he is not a honest boy.

title: ——和他的哥哥相比，他有一颗善良的心。
——他的哥哥在学校也是一个好孩子。

answer.en: In contrast with his brother, he has a virtuous heart.
His brother is also a good student at school.

title: ——即使结果与预期的相反，我们也要以一颗平常心面对。
——也许你是对的。

answer.en: Even the result is in opposition to expectation, we should face it with a common heart all the same.
